testcase.name: Feature: Responsive Design › Desktop › should display charts at full width on desktop
Feature: Responsive Design › Desktop › should show hover effects on desktop
Feature: Responsive Design › Cross-Device Consistency › should maintain data consistency across viewports
Feature: Responsive Design › Cross-Device Consistency › should maintain functionality across devices
Feature: Responsive Design › Orientation Changes › should handle orientation change gracefully
Feature: Responsive Design › Touch Interactions › should support touch interactions on mobile
Feature: Responsive Design › Touch Interactions › should support swipe gestures for scrolling
Feature: Responsive Design › Text Readability › should maintain readable text on small screens
Feature: Responsive Design › Text Readability › should not cause horizontal scrolling on mobile
Feature: Responsive Design › Performance on Different Devices › should load quickly on mobile networks
